entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
